relevant_findings.HEENT: Normocephalic, atraumatic, Pupils equal, round and reactive to light

relevant_findings.lung_bases: Small bilateral pleural effusions with adjacent atelectasis in the lower lobes bilaterally
relevant_findings.abdominal_pelvis: Cylindrical-shaped density in anterior abdominal wall likely representing a postoperative hematoma and high-density in gallbladder bed likely representing a postoperative hematoma. No fluid collections.
relevant_findings.inflammatory_changes: Marked inflammatory stranding centered around pancreas; increased since previous study, without evidence of pancreatic necrosis or hemorrhage

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The degree of inflammatory changes appears to have increased since previous study.
